TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit JavaScriptSerializer extends System.Object

span.span: [Json.NET](http://www.newtonsoft.com/json) should be used serialization and deserialization.

summary.span: 為具有 AJAX 能力的應用程式提供序列化和還原序列化功能。

span.span: Provides serialization and deserialization functionality for AJAX-enabled applications.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 類別在內部使用的非同步通訊層序列化和還原序列化的瀏覽器與 Web 伺服器之間傳遞的資料。The class is used internally by the asynchronous communication layer to serialize and deserialize the data that is passed between the browser and the Web server. 您無法存取該執行個體的序列化程式。You cannot access that instance of the serializer. 不過，此類別會公開公用 API。However, this class exposes a public API. 因此，您可以使用類別，當您想要在 managed 程式碼中處理以 JavaScript 物件標記法 (JSON)。Therefore, you can use the class when you want to work with JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) in managed code. 若要序列化的物件，使用方法。To serialize an object, use the method. 若要還原序列化 JSON 字串，請使用或方法。To deserialize a JSON string, use the or methods. 序列化和還原序列化的原生不支援的型別，實作自訂轉換子透過類別。To serialize and deserialize types that are not natively supported by , implement custom converters by using the class. 使用，以註冊轉換器方法。Then register the converters by using the method. ## Managed 型別與 JSON 之間的對應Mapping Between Managed Types and JSON 下表顯示序列化處理序 managed 型別與 JSON 之間的對應。The following table shows the mapping between managed types and JSON for the serialization process. 這些 managed 的類型的原生支援。These managed types are natively supported by . 當您於 managed 類型還原序列化從 JSON 字串時，適用於相同的對應。When you are deserializing from a JSON string to a managed type, the same mapping applies. 不過，還原序列化可能會非對稱;並非所有可序列化的 managed 型別可從 JSON 還原序列化。However, deserialization can be asymmetric; not all serializable managed types can be deserialized from JSON. > [!NOTE] > 多維度陣列序列化為一維陣列，以及您應該將它當做一般陣列。A multidimensional array is serialized as a one-dimensional array, and you should use it as a flat array. |Managed 的類型Managed type|JSON 的對等項目JSON equivalent| |------------------|---------------------| | (Utf-8 編碼方式僅)。 (UTF-8 encoding only).|StringString| ||StringString| |單一的 null 字元 （例如，\0)Single null char (such as, \0 )|NullNull| ||布林值。Boolean. 表示為 JSON`true`或 `false`Represented in JSON as `true` or `false`| |`null` (`null`物件參考和實值類型)。`null` (`null` object references and value types).|字串值是 nullA string value of null| ||字串值是 nullA string value of null| |基本的數字 （或相容的數值） 類型： ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，和。Primitive numeric (or numeric-compatible) types: , , , , , , , , , and . 會使用的文化特性而異的字串表示。The culture-invariant string representation is used.|numberNumber| ||Date 物件，表示為 JSON 中 「\\/Date （刻度數目）\\/"。Date object, represented in JSON as "\\/Date(number of ticks)\\/". 正數或負數的長值，指出刻度 （毫秒），01 年 1 月、 UTC 1970 午夜起已經過數的刻度數。The number of ticks is a positive or negative long value that indicates the number of ticks (milliseconds) that have elapsed since midnight 01 January, 1970 UTC.

支援的最大值是的日期(12/31/9999 11:59:59 PM) 和支援的最小日期值是(1/1/0001 12:00:00)。The maximum supported date value is (12/31/9999 11:59:59 PM) and the minimum supported date value is (1/1/0001 12:00:00 AM).| |整數類型的列舉型別Enumerations of integer type|列舉值的整數對等項目Integer equivalent of the enumeration value| |型別都會實作或不也實作或。Types that implement or that are not also implementations of or . 這包含類型，例如， ，和。This includes types such as , , and .|使用 JSON 陣列語法的陣列Array that uses JSON array syntax| |型別都會實作或。Types that implement or . 這包含類型，例如和。This includes types such as and .|使用 JSON 字典語法的 JavaScript 物件JavaScript object that uses JSON dictionary syntax| |具體 （非抽象），自訂型別必須具有公用的執行個體屬性 get 存取子或公用執行個體欄位。Custom concrete (non-abstract) types that have public instance properties that have get accessors or public instance fields.

請注意與公用的唯寫屬性、 公用屬性或公用欄位屬性標示，而且會忽略在這些類型的公用索引的屬性。Note that public write-only properties, public property or public field attributes marked with , and public indexed properties in these types are ignored.|JavaScript 會使用 JSON 字典語法的物件。JavaScript object that uses JSON dictionary syntax. 名為"__type"的特殊的中繼資料屬性就會包含以確保正確的還原序列化。A special metadata property named "__type" is included to ensure correct deserialization. 請確定公用執行個體屬性有 get 和 set 存取子，以確保正確的還原序列化。Make sure that public instance properties have get and set accessors to ensure correct deserialization.| ||GUID 的字串表示法String representation of a GUID| ||傳回值的字串表示法 String representation of the return value of | ## Examples 第一個範例提供如何序列化和還原序列化資料物件的一個簡單的範例。The first example provides a simple illustration of how to serialize and deserialize data objects. 它需要類別名稱如下所示的人員。It requires a class names Person which is shown below. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/cs/default.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/vb/default.aspx.vb#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/cs/default.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/vb/default.aspx.vb#2)] 下一個範例顯示更複雜且完整的專案使用來儲存和還原物件的狀態使用 JSON 序列化的類別。The next example shows a more complicated and complete project that uses the class to save and restore the state of an object by using JSON serialization. 此程式碼會使用所提供的自訂轉換器類別。This code uses a custom converter that is provided for the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Script.Serialization#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.Script.Serialization/CS/Default.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Script.Serialization#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.Script.Serialization/VB/Default.aspx#4)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public JavaScriptSerializer ();
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Public Sub New ()
public: JavaScriptSerializer();

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，該執行個體沒有類型解析程式。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that has no type resolver.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行個體類別，而不型別解析程式序列化的 JSON 字串中不包含型別中繼資料屬性 （名稱為"__type"）。An instance of the class without a type resolver does not include type metadata properties (named "__type") in the serialized JSON string. 型別中繼資料屬性供和方法來判斷適當的 managed 類型的 JSON 字串轉換。A type metadata property is used by the and methods to determine the appropriate managed type to which the JSON string will be converted. 型別解析程式的相關資訊，請參閱類別。For information about type resolvers, see the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public JavaScriptSerializer (System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptTypeResolver resolver);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptTypeResolver resolver) cil managed
Public Sub New (resolver As JavaScriptTypeResolver)
public: JavaScriptSerializer(System::Web::Script::Serialization::JavaScriptTypeResolver ^ resolver);

param.name: resolver
param.span: 自訂的類型解析程式物件。

span.span: The custom type-resolver object.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，該執行個體有自訂的類型解析程式。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that has a custom type resolver.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 它會序列化物件時類別會使用`resolver`參數來決定要包含在序列化的 JSON 字串型別中繼資料屬性 ("__type") 中的適當值。When it is serializing an object, the class uses the `resolver` parameter to determine the appropriate value to include in the serialized JSON string for the type metadata property ("__type"). 同樣地，當類別還原序列化 JSON 字串、 它適當的 managed 型別解析的類型中繼資料屬性值使用解析程式執行個體。Similarly, when the class is deserializing a JSON string, it resolves the type metadata property value to the appropriate managed type by using the resolver instance. 您可以設定`resolver`參數`null`，相當於呼叫建構函式。You can set the `resolver` parameter to `null`, which is equivalent to calling the constructor. 執行個體叫用 Web 服務用戶端指令碼中的使用特殊的型別解析程式用的非同步通訊層。The instance of that is used by the asynchronous communication layer for invoking Web services from client script uses a special type resolver. 這個型別解析程式會限制可還原序列化的型別所定義的 Web 服務的方法簽章或會套用。This type resolver restricts the types that can be deserialized to those defined in the Web service’s method signature, or the ones that have the applied. 您無法以程式設計方式修改這個內建型別解析程式。You cannot modify this built-in type resolver programmatically. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用自訂型別解析程式以初始化此物件的執行個體可以存在的安全性風險。Using an instance of this object initialized with a custom type-resolver can present a security risk. 此物件只適用於受信任的資料。Use this object only with trusted data. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[資料驗證](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation).

MemberSignature.Value: public object ConvertToType (object obj, Type targetType);
.method public hidebysig instance object ConvertToType(object obj, class System.Type targetType) cil managed
Public Function ConvertToType (obj As Object, targetType As Type) As Object
public: System::Object ^ ConvertToType(System::Object ^ obj, Type ^ targetType);

span.span: The object to convert.

param.name: targetType
param.span: 要將物件轉換成的類型。

span.span: The type to convert the object to.

summary.span: 將指定的物件轉換成指定的類型。

span.span: Converts the specified object to the specified type.

returns.span: 序列化的 JSON 字串。

span.span: The serialized JSON string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當執行個體正在序列化的型別已註冊自訂轉換子的序列化程式呼叫方法，以取得要被轉換成 JSON 格式的字串名稱/值組的字典。When the instance is serializing a type for which a custom converter is registered, the serializer calls the method to obtain the dictionary of name/value pairs that will be converted to a JSON-formatted string. 方法也可以擲回例外狀況是，如果物件圖表過於複雜、，或已註冊的執行個體造成轉換器遞迴。The method can also throw exceptions if the object graph is too complex, or if registered instances of have caused converter recursion.

exception.span: 產生的 JSON 格式字串超過 的值。

span.span: The resulting JSON-formatted string exceeds the value of .
-or-
contains a circular reference.

exception.span: 當子物件具有父物件的參考，而父物件又具有子物件的參考時，就會發生循環參考。

span.span: A circular reference occurs when a child object has a reference to a parent object, and the parent object has a reference to the child object.

exception.span: 已超出 所定義的遞迴限制。

span.span: The recursion limit defined by was exceeded.

MemberSignature.Value: public T ConvertToType<T> (object obj);
.method public hidebysig instance !!T ConvertToType<T>(object obj) cil managed
Public Function ConvertToType(Of T) (obj As Object) As T

span.span: The type to which obj will be converted.
The object to convert.

summary.span: 將指定的物件轉換為指定類型。

span.span: Converts the given object to the specified type.

returns.span: 已轉換成目標類型的物件。

span.span: The object that has been converted to the target type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法嘗試將轉換的物件執行個體所表示之`obj`型別的執行個體`T`。The method tries to convert the object instance that is represented by `obj` to an instance of type `T`. 此轉換期間並不會保留物件參考相等的保證。During this conversion there is no guarantee that object reference equality is maintained. 因此，您不能假設`obj`和`T`參考相同的物件。Therefore, you cannot assume that `obj` and `T` refer to the same object. 適用於如果您實作衍生自類別。 is intended to be used if you implement a class that derives from . 轉換子程式碼必須能夠進行序列化程式會將傳遞給它，在字典中的值，然後將該值轉換為類型的執行個體`T`。Converter code must be able to take a value that is in the dictionary that the serializer passes to it, and then convert that value to an instance of type `T`. 而不要重新實作來執行此工作的自訂轉換程式碼，您可以呼叫從轉換程式碼的方法。Instead of re-implementing the custom conversion code to perform this task, you can call the method from the converter code. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法，以取得從傳遞至轉換器的字典中值的物件。The following example shows how to use the method to obtain a object from a value in the dictionary that is passed to the converter. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Script.Serialization#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.Script.Serialization/CS/App_Code/ListItemCollectionConverter.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Script.Serialization#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.Script.Serialization/VB/App_Code/ListItemCollectionConverter.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public T Deserialize<T> (string input);
.method public hidebysig instance !!T Deserialize<T>(string input) cil managed
Public Function Deserialize(Of T) (input As String) As T

span.span: The type of the resulting object.

param.name: input
param.span: 要還原序列化的 JSON 字串。

span.span: The JSON string to be deserialized.

summary.span: 將指定的 JSON 字串轉換成 類型的物件。

span.span: Converts the specified JSON string to an object of type .
The deserialized object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法相當於第一個使用方法，以取得物件圖形，然後嘗試將結果轉換為輸入`T`。The method is equivalent to first using the method to obtain an object graph and then trying to cast the result to type `T`. 還原序列化時，序列化程式的目前的型別解析參考時，可判斷轉換的陣列和字典類型內巢狀項目時要使用的 managed 的類型。During deserialization, the serializer’s current type resolver is referenced, which determines the managed type to use when converting elements that are nested inside arrays and dictionary types. 如此一來，在還原序列化處理逐一查看所有巢狀元素的`input`。As a result, the deserialization process iterates through all nested elements of `input`. 如需型別解析程式的詳細資訊，請參閱類別。For more information about type resolvers, see the class. ## Examples 下列範例提供如何序列化和還原序列化資料物件的一個簡單的範例。The following example provides a simple illustration of how to serialize and deserialize data objects. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Script.JavaScriptSerializer](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/cs/default.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Script.JavaScriptSerializer](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/vb/default.aspx.vb#1)] 它需要名為類別`Person`，這下列範例所示。It requires a class named `Person`, which is shown in the following example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Script.JavaScriptSerializer](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/cs/default.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Script.JavaScriptSerializer](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/vb/default.aspx.vb#2)]

span.span: Converts the specified JSON string to an object graph.
The deserialized object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此還原序列化方法不會嘗試轉型為特定的型別，物件圖形的根如同方法。This deserialization method does not try to cast the root of the object graph to a specific type, as with the method.

The length exceeds the value of .

span.span: is a dictionary type and a non-string key value was encountered.

exception.span: 包含的成員定義未在目標類型上提供。

span.span: includes member definitions that are not available on the target type.

exception.span: 包含表示自訂類型的 “__type” 屬性，但目前與序列化程式相關聯的類型解析程式找不到對應的 Managed 類型。

span.span: contains a "__type" property that indicates a custom type, but the type resolver that is currently associated with the serializer cannot find a corresponding managed type.
-or-

exception.span: 包含表示自訂類型的 “__type” 屬性，但還原序列化對應 JSON 字串的結果無法指派給預期的目標類型。

span.span: contains a "__type" property that indicates a custom type, but the result of deserializing the corresponding JSON string cannot be assigned to the expected target type.
-or-

exception.span: 包含 “__type” 屬性，表示 或不可執行個體化的類型 (例如抽象類型或介面)。

span.span: contains a "__type" property that indicates either or a non-instantiable type (for example, an abstract type or an interface).
-or-

exception.span: 嘗試將 JSON 陣列轉換成陣列式的 Managed 類型，但是不支援使用該類型做為 JSON 還原序列化目標。

span.span: An attempt was made to convert a JSON array to an array-like managed type that is not supported for use as a JSON deserialization target.
-or-
It is not possible to convert to the target type.

MemberSignature.Value: public int MaxJsonLength { get; set; }
.property instance int32 MaxJsonLength
Public Property MaxJsonLength As Integer
public: property int MaxJsonLength { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 類別接受的 JSON 字串最大長度。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum length of JSON strings that are accepted by the class.
The maximum length of JSON strings.

value.span: 預設值為 2097152 個字元，這相當於 4 MB 的 Unicode 字串資料。

span.span: The default is 2097152 characters, which is equivalent to 4 MB of Unicode string data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值屬性適用於僅當您明確建立的執行個體類別。The value of the property applies only when you explicitly create an instance of the class. 使用`jsonSerialization`組態檔來設定內部的序列化程式執行個體所使用的非同步通訊層的最大長度的項目。Use the `jsonSerialization` element of the configuration file to set the maximum length for the internal serializer instance that is used by the asynchronous communication layer. 如需序列化的組態項目，請參閱[How to： 設定 ASP.NET 服務在 Microsoft Ajax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ea4fb56e-bc1d-405a-9877-00cf5e552a30)。For more information about the configuration elements for serialization, see [How to: Configure ASP.NET Services in Microsoft Ajax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ea4fb56e-bc1d-405a-9877-00cf5e552a30).

exception.span: 屬性設為小於 1 的值。

span.span: The property is set to a value that is less than one.

MemberSignature.Value: public int RecursionLimit { get; set; }
.property instance int32 RecursionLimit
Public Property RecursionLimit As Integer
public: property int RecursionLimit { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定要處理物件層級數目的限制。

span.span: Gets or sets the limit for constraining the number of object levels to process.
The number of object levels.
The default is 100.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性參考到的物件階層中的層級數目的會處理在下列情況：The property refers to the number of levels in the object hierarchy that will process in the following cases: - 當類別還原序列化 JSON 字串。When the class is deserializing a JSON string. - 當類別在序列化期間查核物件圖形。When the class is walking an object graph during serialization. 值適用於僅當您明確建立的執行個體類別。The value of applies only when you explicitly create an instance of the class. 使用`jsonSerialization`組態檔來設定要處理的非同步通訊層使用內部序列化程式執行個體的物件層級數目的項目。Use the `jsonSerialization` element of the configuration file to set the number of object levels to process for the internal serializer instance that is used by the asynchronous communication layer. 如需序列化的組態項目，請參閱[How to： 設定 ASP.NET 服務在 Microsoft Ajax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ea4fb56e-bc1d-405a-9877-00cf5e552a30)。For more information about the configuration elements for serialization, see [How to: Configure ASP.NET Services in Microsoft Ajax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ea4fb56e-bc1d-405a-9877-00cf5e552a30).

exception.span: 屬性設為小於 1 的值。

span.span: The property is set to a value that is less than one.

MemberSignature.Value: public void RegisterConverters (System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter> converters);
.method public hidebysig instance void RegisterConverters(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter> converters) cil managed
Public Sub RegisterConverters (converters As IEnumerable(Of JavaScriptConverter))
public: void RegisterConverters(System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<System::Web::Script::Serialization::JavaScriptConverter ^> ^ converters);

param.name: converters
param.span: 陣列，包含要註冊的自訂轉換子。

span.span: An array that contains the custom converters to be registered.

summary.span: 向 執行個體註冊自訂轉換子。

span.span: Registers a custom converter with the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以註冊使用的一或多個自訂轉換子所使用的執行個體方法。You can register one or more custom converters with a instance by using the method. 當註冊自訂轉換子時，使用轉換器，將 managed 的類型的序列化和還原序列化 JSON 字串為 managed 型別。When custom converters are registered, uses the converters both to serialize managed types and to deserialize JSON strings to managed types. 多個轉換子可以註冊具有相同執行個體，而且這些轉換工具可以表示相同類型的支援。Multiple converters can be registered with the same instance, and these converters can indicate support for the same type. 如此一來，已為特定類型的最後一個轉換器會將使用的一個序列化的型別。As a result, the last converter that is registered for a specific type is the one that will be used by to serialize the type. 如需自訂轉換子的詳細資訊，請參閱類別。For more information about custom converters, see the class. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何註冊與自訂轉換子執行個體。The following example shows how to register a custom converter with a instance. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Script.Serialization#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.Script.Serialization/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Script.Serialization#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.Script.Serialization/VB/Default.aspx#1)]

span.span: is .

summary.span: 將物件轉換成 JSON 字串。

span.span: Converts an object to a JSON string.

MemberSignature.Value: public string Serialize (object obj);
.method public hidebysig instance string Serialize(object obj) cil managed
Public Function Serialize (obj As Object) As String
public: System::String ^ Serialize(System::Object ^ obj);

span.span: The object to serialize.

summary.span: 將物件轉換成 JSON 字串。

span.span: Converts an object to a JSON string.

returns.span: 序列化的 JSON 字串。

span.span: The serialized JSON string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當執行個體正在序列化的型別已註冊自訂轉換子的序列化程式呼叫方法，以取得會轉換成 JSON 字串的名稱/值組的字典。When the instance is serializing a type for which a custom converter is registered, the serializer calls the method to obtain the dictionary of name/value pairs that will be converted to a JSON string. 方法也可以擲回例外狀況是，如果物件圖表過於複雜、，或已註冊的執行個體造成轉換器遞迴。The method can also throw exceptions if the object graph is too complex, or if registered instances of have caused converter recursion. ## Examples 下列範例提供如何序列化和還原序列化資料物件的一個簡單的範例。The following example provides a simple illustration of how to serialize and deserialize data objects. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Script.JavaScriptSerializer](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/cs/default.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Script.JavaScriptSerializer](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/vb/default.aspx.vb#1)] 它需要名為類別`Person`，這下列範例所示。It requires a class named `Person`, which is shown in the following example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Script.JavaScriptSerializer](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/cs/default.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Script.JavaScriptSerializer](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/vb/default.aspx.vb#2)]

exception.span: 產生的 JSON 字串超過 的值。

span.span: The resulting JSON string exceeds the value of .
-or-
contains a circular reference.

exception.span: 當子物件具有父物件的參考，而父物件又具有子物件的參考時，就會發生循環參考。

span.span: A circular reference occurs when a child object has a reference to a parent object, and the parent object has a reference to the child object.

exception.span: 已超出 所定義的遞迴限制。

span.span: The recursion limit defined by was exceeded.
